content:
When I can't sleep,
I listen to the late night shows on "Daily Shortwave"

content:
Rest when night falls,
that's what my 108-year-old great-grandma
taught me about staying healthy.
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
One time I heard
the host say her headset was actually a hamburger!
That made it even harder to fall asleep.

content:
I'll definitely go to bed early tonight!
And if I don't go to bed early tonight, then I'll... I'll...
Go to bed early tomorrow night!
info: 闲聊-一天结束（19-4）闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Every night before bed,
I can't help but jump up and practice my Legendary Lobster-Subduing Technique.
But oh boy, after just a few moves, the sun's already rising!

content:
But you know...
Understanding something is one thing,
(nervously) Actually doing it is another matter entirely.
